snippet: An online ad by Roland Sledge’s campaign to join the Texas Railroad Commission has drawn attention for riffing on an old — and colorful — Will Rogers quote.
abstract: Houston energy lawyer Roland Sledge produces a campaign advertisement that portrays a man urinating on an electric fence; the ad, part of Sledge's run for a seat on the Texas Railroad Commission, is intended to mock politicians who lack common sense.
lead_paragraph: An online ad by Roland Sledge’s campaign to join the Texas Railroad Commission has drawn attention for riffing on an old — and colorful — Will Rogers quote.

headline.seo: Campaign Video Gets Attention in Texas Commissioner Race
headline.main: Nature’s Call Draws Views for a Texan’s Political Ad
headline.print_headline: Nature’s Call Draws Views For a Texan’s Political Ad
